original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2151)@</color>  以自身為中心將周圍地面化為流沙，降低範圍內敵人移動力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2151)@</color> Turn the surrounding ground into quicksand around itself, reducing the movement of enemies within the range.
